document_data.name: ''Wand of Stick''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of stick''''' was an unenchanted [[wand]], making it essentially just a stick.
document_data.Description: Being non-magical pieces of wood, the wands had no apparent [[magic]]al qualities or uses. Unlike ''[[wand of magic missiles|wands of magic missiles]]'', which were wands that produced the ''[[magic missile]]'' [[spell]], ''wands of stick'' did not produce the ''[[stick]]'' spell.
